statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); user=$(whoami); branch=$(cd "$dir" && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ] && [ ${#branch} -gt 40 ]; then branch="${branch:0:27}...${branch: -10}"; fi; dirty=""; if [ -n "$branch" ] && [ -n "$(cd "$dir" && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null)" ]; then dirty=" *"; fi; pct=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".context_window.used_percentage // empty"); out="\033[36m${user}\033[0m :: \033[32m$(basename "$dir")\033[0m"; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then out="$out on \033[35m${branch}${dirty}\033[0m"; fi; out="$out :: \033[90m[${model}]\033[0m"; if [ -n "$pct" ]; then out="$out :: \033[33m${pct}%\033[0m"; fi; echo -e "$out"'
